```{r}
library(readr)
```

SIMPLE LINEAR REGRESSION: Exercise 14.7
Import Annual Dues data and rename variables
```{r}
ad<- read_table2("/Volumes/5ive3rds/CSULB/Classes/510/Data/Data Sets KN/KutnerData/Chapter 14 Data Sets/CH14PR07.txt", 
    col_names = FALSE)
names(ad)<-c("y","x")
View(ad)
```

Run logistic regression summary
```{r}
fit.ad<-glm(y~x,family=binomial,data=ad)
summary(fit.ad)
```

Analysis of Deviance Table
```{r}
anova(fit.ad)
```


MULTIPLE LINEAR REGRESSION: Exercise 14.13
Import Car Purchase data and rename variables
```{r}
crp<- read_table2("/Volumes/5ive3rds/CSULB/Classes/510/Data/Data Sets KN/KutnerData/Chapter 14 Data Sets/CH14PR13.txt", 
    col_names = FALSE)
names(crp)<-c("y","x1","x2")
View(crp)
```

Run logistic regression summary
```{r}
fit.crp<-glm(y~x1+x2,family=binomial,data=crp)
summary(fit.crp)
```

Analysis of Deviance Table
```{r}
anova(fit.crp)
```
